name: Riding Champion: Legacy of Rosemond Hill
name_original: Riding Champion: Legacy of Rosemond Hill
description: If you’ve ever dreamed of owning your own horse, or are lucky enough to have one, you’ll love this exciting riding simulation game that takes place at the glorious Rosemond Hill Estate. Annie has always dreamt of owning her own horse, and when she receives an unexpected inheritance, her dream is fulfilled. It’s up to you to make sure Annie and her horse become a winning team. Make new friends, groom your horse, and practice hard to bring home the blue ribbon!
